website_summaries.verdict: One of the few premium hose extension kits on the market for the ultimate amount of durability and efficiency.
pros: High quality construction offers better weather, element, and UV resistance to keep the hose in good condition
The interior of the hose is designed to provide smoother flow, preventing debris from clogging the system
cons: Several times more expensive than the common budget extension hoses

customer_reviews.title: Waste master
customer_reviews.text: This is a hot setup. I got the the hole setup with all attachments for it. Just about 40 feet long. To me it was the only way to go. Also a very clean setup and put away to. Must have if you full time Rving.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceTrucker

customer_reviews.title: Great hose.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Cam locks are the bomb!!! Only thing lacking is plugs for end of hose. Bought plugs online so when unhooking and stowing I can plug the ends now.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lahm

customer_reviews.title: For the extra length sometimes needed
customer_reviews.text: This system as a whole, Lippert Waste Management, is the best and for those times when the extra length is needed this is a must. So much better than those bayonet style system.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Same quality as main hose
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would change is making it in two equal units so I could use just half when needed.
customer_reviews.author: RV Guy

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Coupler was not glued!
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to warn everyone buying it to check the included coupler before using it. Fortunately before using this extension hose, I inspected it after receiving it and one side was not glued at all and the other side was improperly glued. The problem was not readily apparent at first look, so make sure you thoroughly check it after you receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Davis

customer_reviews.title: As good as the original
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the first part for years (I full time) and it works great. The extension seems to be just as good. I like that it doesn’t have the final head piece so I can hook it up to my mascerator if I need to. Only 3 stars because of price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Warren

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid!
customer_reviews.text: No More twisting and fidgeting with the standard fittings. These go on easy and lock very securely. I like them much better than the original fittings.
customer_reviews.author: WPNorton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra expense
customer_reviews.text: What a blessing this system is! So easy to use and so much more safe for your protection and safety of exposure
customer_reviews.author: rosepetals

customer_reviews.title: Best quality RV sewer lines.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is just great. Heavy duty, easy to install and use. I have the lippert waste system already. This was just an extension. If I had to say anything negative, there should be some plastic dust and debris covers for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Neil C.

customer_reviews.title: Be sure you know what you are ordering. I made a mistake .
customer_reviews.text: This is an extension not the hose that fit into the sewer to empty the tanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have as you never know when you might need the extra length....
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: A nice improvement on waste management.
customer_reviews.text: This is a major improvement over the traditional RV waste connections and hoses. Very easy installation as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Dussault

customer_reviews.title: This works very well if ever I needed another one I will buy from them
customer_reviews.text: Love this product makes life so much easier thank you and for sending it so promptly
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these no leaking there well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: ITGTONY

customer_reviews.title: Function / Well built
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot more robust than the normal RV sewer hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought this product years ago - never will use the brown stinky link again
customer_reviews.author: Laura R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: it's an RV sewer hose
customer_reviews.text: it works as it is supposed to. The item is pricey but I have no choice in what I need to use on our RV
customer_reviews.author: Sean T.

customer_reviews.title: First impressions
customer_reviews.text: Received this product in the mail 3/3/20. The connector was scratched up and looked like it had been in storage for a very long time..
customer_reviews.author: ROCKY

customer_reviews.title: No mor twisting on connections. Push in and snap ...
customer_reviews.text: No mor twisting on connections. Push in and snap the 2 side clamps shut and no mess connection is complete.
customer_reviews.author: sgmjack35

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. same quality as the original hose i bought.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but needs an adaptor to bayonet connectors
customer_reviews.text: Great item, well made but... Needs an adaptor to bayonet connection on my trailer
customer_reviews.author: William Dishong

product_meta.title: Lippert Components 20' Waste Extension Kit
product_meta.description: Extend your Waste Master Sewer hose with the 20' Extension Kit from Lippert Components. The 20' hose gives you a wider range plus all the great Waste Master Hose features you have come to love. Unlike traditional hose coils that trap debris, the tough, wireless Waste Master hose is designed with its helical coil on the outside, while the inside is much smoother, preventing waste from getting trapped inside the hose. The UV-protected hose features technology that keeps it extended during use to the exact length required.
feature_bullets: 20' Waste Master Extension Kit; Includes Cam Lock and Hose, does not include Nozzle
Wireless hoses keeps debris from getting trapped
Hose is designed with a helical coil on the outside providing a smoother inside
Hose stays extended during use to the exact length required

specifications.Cover Included: 20' Hose with Male Cam Lock Ends, Female Cam Lock Fitting, Plug Insert
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars52 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
